schwaebische.de.113476.1: Biker reacts at lightning speed and prevents worse
schwaebische.de.113476.2: On Friday evening, a traffic accident occurred on the country road between Machtolsheim and Merklingen, in which a motorcyclist was only slightly injured thanks to his quick reaction.
schwaebische.de.113476.4: A 44-year-old female driver wanted to turn left at around 9.30 p.m. with her VW coming from Merklingen onto Landesstraße 1230 in the direction of Machtolsheim.
schwaebische.de.113476.5: Here she overlooked the 24-year-old motorcyclist with right of way coming from the direction of Nellingen.
schwaebische.de.113476.6: Hand and foot brake levers fly away in the event of a collision
schwaebische.de.113476.7: The biker still tried to avoid the car, but still touched it at the rear of the vehicle.
schwaebische.de.113476.8: Due to the grazing process, the hand and foot brake levers on the Suzuki were torn off and the driver was no longer able to brake.
schwaebische.de.113476.9: Mindfully, he steered his motorcycle in the green stiffeners next to the road and let it roll out there without falling.
schwaebische.de.113476.11: Due to the collision with the car, the biker nevertheless suffered an injury to the Beim and had to be treated in a clinic.
np-coburg.de.105627.1: Mamming: Corona mass infection: 174 harvest workers infected
np-coburg.de.105627.2: Following a mass corona infection on a large vegetable farm in Mamming, Lower Bavaria, almost 500 people are under quarantine and are no longer allowed to leave the business.
np-coburg.de.105627.3: A security service monitors the ban on going out.
np-coburg.de.105627.4: A total of 174 harvest workers were tested positive for the corona pathogen Sars-CoV-2 during the screening, as the Dingolfing-Landau District Office announced on Saturday evening.
np-coburg.de.105627.5: " In order to avoid further spread, we unfortunately have to take this step to protect the population, " explained District Administrator Werner Bumeder (CSU).
np-coburg.de.105627.6: Previously, seven employees in the company had already been infected - this was the reason for the series test.
np-coburg.de.105627.7: The farm is a large vegetable farm that grows strawberries, cucumbers, cabbage and beetroot - but the cucumbers are only for jars.
np-coburg.de.105627.8: Mamming is a rural community with a population of around 3,300, not far from Dingolfing with its large BMW plant.
np-coburg.de.105627.9: Bumeder appealed to the citizens to keep calm: " According to our information, this is a closed circle of people. "
np-coburg.de.105627.10: On the farm, infected employees were separated from non-infected employees, and the site is now surrounded by a fence.
np-coburg.de.105627.11: The Greens and the SPD gave joint responsibility to the state government.
np-coburg.de.105627.12: The two opposition parties accused Prime Minister Markus Söder (CSU) and his cabinet of neglecting control over the accommodation of seasonal workers.
np-coburg.de.105627.13: " This can take bitter revenge if such local infections take hold and regional lockdowns have to be ordered, " said Jürgen Mistol, the parliamentary executive director of the Greens.
np-coburg.de.105627.14: The SPD takes a similar view: " Following the outbreak of corona in the Wiesenhof slaughterhouse in mid-May, we have already called for a special control programme for farms with harvest workers, " said environmental expert Florian von Brunn.
np-coburg.de.105627.15: " In our view, hygiene conditions in the workplace and living conditions in particular must be rigorously monitored.
np-coburg.de.105627.17: The outbreak came " with an announcement. "
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.1: Underground station Aidenbachstraße: Dangerous quarrel: 19-year-old falls into the track bed after Schubser
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.2: During an argument between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstraße underground station, a 19-year-old fell through a pusher and slipped into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.3: Obersendling - On Friday, around 4: 15 p.m., a quarrel broke out between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstraße underground station.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.4: A passer-by alerted the police, who arrived with several patrols.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.5: According to initial investigations, a resident of Munich (17) pushed a 19-year-old to the ground.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.6: The young man slid over the edge of the platform and fell into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.7: People from the group of the 17-year-old helped the fallen man to climb off the track.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.8: There was no danger of an approaching train.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.9: According to the police, clashes broke out again between the two people.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.10: The 17-year-old initially fled the scene, but his identity could be determined afterwards.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.11: Accompanied by his father, he went to police station 29.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.12: The 17-year-old is under investigation for bodily injury.
landeszeitung.de.13223.1: Report: Seehofer urges longer data retention
landeszeitung.de.13223.3: However, according to a media report, the Federal Minister of the Interior, Horst Seehofer, is calling for an extension of the storage period.
landeszeitung.de.13223.4: He wants to strengthen the fight against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.5: According to a media report, the Federal Minister of the Interior, Horst Seehofer (CSU), is calling for data retention to be extended - for six months instead of the planned ten weeks.
landeszeitung.de.13223.6: As reported by " Bild am Sonntag, " Seehofer sent a letter to Justice Minister Christine Lambrecht (SPD) asking for a swift amendment to the law.
landeszeitung.de.13223.7: Seehofer wants to strengthen the measures against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.8: He believes it makes sense " to make urgently needed adjustments to the law now, " the newspaper quoted from the letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.10: A decision by the European Court of Justice is expected.
landeszeitung.de.13223.11: Seehofer, however, wants the changes in advance so that they can be applied immediately following a possible positive judgement, the report continues.
landeszeitung.de.13223.12: A spokesperson for the Ministry of Justice told the newspaper that it would only make sense to examine whether legal adjustments were needed once the courts had decided.
landeszeitung.de.13223.13: In the fight against child abuse and child pornography, Seehofer, together with the interior ministers of the federal states, had already spoken out in favour of data retention in June.
bild.255016.1: NBA: Stripclub-Ärger für Clippers-Star Lou Williams
bild.255016.3: Lou Williams (33), professional basketball player for the Los Angeles Clippers, is said to have left the tournament quarters in Disney World in Orlando, Florida, with permission for a funeral.
bild.255016.4: According to US media reports, he visited the strip club " Magic City " in Atlanta in the evening.
bild.255016.5: Williams, who according to ESPN admitted the visit, is back in isolation, tested daily for COVID-19.
bild.255016.6: His reason for the visit: Chicken Wings.
bild.255016.7: In February last year, " Sweet Lou, " as he is known in the NBA, expressed his love for precisely these wings.
bild.255016.8: The American wrote: " Magic City and Blue Flame (another strip club in Atlanta) have the best wings in town. "
bild.255016.9: NBA insider Shams Charania announced on Twitter on Sunday that the NBA Williams has ordered a ten-day quarantine.
bild.255016.10: As a result, the Clippers star will miss the first two official games after the friendly phase.
bild.255016.11: In Disney World, the NBA wants to bring the corona season to an end.
bild.255016.12: The top 22 teams are currently playing training matches to prepare for the season finale, which begins on Friday night.
np-coburg.de.105625.1: Söder comments on corona situation after mass infection
np-coburg.de.105625.2: Munich - Health Minister Melanie Huml (CSU) announced a test campaign for large farms on Sunday.
np-coburg.de.105625.3: The press conference will be shown live on our homepage.
np-coburg.de.105625.4: The case in Mamming in the district of Dingolfing-Landau has alarmed authorities and politicians.
np-coburg.de.105625.5: Almost 500 harvest workers from several countries are currently working on the large vegetable farm, and more than a third have been infected with the corona pathogen.
np-coburg.de.105625.6: The farm is now under quarantine and is cordoned off with a construction fence.
np-coburg.de.105625.7: No one is allowed to leave the premises, food is delivered.
np-coburg.de.105625.8: The authorities are now offering the 3,300 residents of the community free corona tests.
np-coburg.de.105625.9: Since the harvest workers had little contact with the local population, the district administration has so far assumed that the infections have not spread beyond the farm.
kurier.at.204625.1: " Pangs of conscience ": Confession of the alleged arsonist of Nantes
kurier.at.204625.2: " My client has shown himself to be cooperative, " lawyer Quentin Chabert told the newspaper.
kurier.at.204625.3: The defence lawyer added: " He deeply regrets the actions, the confession was a release for him. "
kurier.at.204625.4: His mandate is " plagued by pangs of conscience and deeply affected by the extent of the destruction. "
kurier.at.204625.5: According to the public prosecutor's office, if convicted, the man faces ten years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros.
kurier.at.204625.6: The Gothic St. Peter and Paul's Cathedral in Nantes was severely damaged in a fire on Saturday night last week.
kurier.at.204625.7: The fire broke out in three distant places in the church.
kurier.at.204625.8: Laboratory tests confirmed the suspicion of arson.
kurier.at.204625.9: The suspect, who has now been detained, was arrested just a few hours after the fire.
kurier.at.204625.10: However, he was released one day later.
kurier.at.204625.11: The man works as a volunteer for the diocese of Nantes and was responsible for closing the cathedral on the eve of the fire.
kurier.at.204625.12: Since there was no trace of a violent intrusion into the church, he quickly became the focus of the investigators' attention.
infranken.de.309597.1: Discuss the abolition of the 50 + 1 rule
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB President Reinhard Grindel has recommended that consideration be given to abolishing the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: " German football should at least discuss laying down conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates a fait accompli, " Grindel told " Bild am Sonntag. "
infranken.de.309597.4: He stressed: " For the clubs that are most likely to pose a threat to Bayern and Dortmund, the 50 + 1 rules don't work anyway: see Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, there is no getting around the debate as to whether it is not appropriate to make it easier for clubs that want to break into this phalanx to involve investors. "
infranken.de.309597.6: However, he has doubts as to whether there is a willingness in the German Football League to allow majority participation, which is prohibited in the Bundesliga by the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.7: " It remains a legal risk to erect investment fences around the Bundesliga as a business location in a European internal market, " said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former DFB boss sees the danger that " the attempts to create a more competitive balance in the Bundesliga will ultimately only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs on a European level, but will not lead to more tension in the championship. "
infranken.de.309597.9: Even an equal distribution of TV money will not have a decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: " FC Bayern have a turnover of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund of 500 million and RB Leipzig of 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: The differences between the first three clubs alone are immense.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million, " explained the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.13: Looking back at the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: " Unfortunately, there were people who noticed this mistake and leaked it to the press instead of talking to me about it, " said Grindel about the acceptance of an expensive watch, which led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: " On a human level, that has kept me very busy. "
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift worth around 11,000 euros from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: " I have committed a breach of compliance, and it was right to draw the consequences from this, " said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.18: " I handled the ominous watch gift in a completely transparent and unsuspecting manner.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many in the DFB knew about it. "
infranken.de.309597.20: He had never " made a secret of the gift, " the 58-year-old assured.
infranken.de.309597.21: " You might call it naive, but this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption. "
faz.79601.1: " Black Lives Matter ": injured and one dead
faz.79601.2: Protests against police violence in the United States have come to a head again as a result of Donald Trump's deployment of federal police in several cities.
faz.79601.3: On Saturday clashes broke out between demonstrators and police officers in various cities.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville, and 16 people were arrested in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, a person was shot and killed while a march was crossing an intersection.
faz.79601.6: Prior to this, clashes broke out again in Portland during protests against racism and police violence.
faz.79601.7: The security forces, including officers from the Federal Police, used tear gas on Saturday night and violently dispersed demonstrators.
faz.79601.8: Hundreds of demonstrators, some of them armed, marched through Louisville in Kentucky on Saturday, demanding that those responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor be held accountable.
faz.79601.9: The 26-year-old student was shot dead in March during a drug raid in her apartment in Louisville.
faz.79601.10: The target of the raid was someone else who did not live there, and no drugs were found.
faz.79601.11: When a member of a group that describes itself as an armed alliance of black Americans fired a shot on Saturday, three people were injured.
faz.79601.12: According to NBC, they were taken to hospital.
faz.79601.13: None of them was in mortal danger.
faz.79601.14: The police set up barricades because counter-demonstrators from a white militia had also formed.
faz.79601.15: In the end, the two groups did not come together.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, a person was shot and killed in the course of a " Black Lives Matter " demonstration.
faz.79601.17: According to their own statements, the police took a suspect into custody.
faz.79601.18: She has not yet provided any further details on the circumstances of the crime.
faz.79601.19: According to the " New York Times, " Mayor Steve Adler said that he, like many in the city, was " inconsolable and stunned " by what had happened.
faz.79601.20: Demonstrators also clashed with the police in the American metropolis of Seattle on Saturday.
faz.79601.21: They set fire to construction vehicles in front of a youth prison, and the police used stun grenades and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: According to the " Seattle Times, " 16 people were arrested for resisting police officers or for bodily harm.
faz.79601.23: In the city of Oakland, California, a courthouse was set on fire.
faz.79601.24: A small group of demonstrators smashed windows, fired fireworks and blinded police officers with lasers, Oakland police announced late on Saturday evening (local time).
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver in Colorado, a car drove through a crowd demonstrating on a highway.
faz.79601.27: According to the police, one of the demonstrators fired a weapon and at least one person was injured and taken to hospital.
faz.79601.28: In addition, windows were smashed in a court and a fire was set, according to the police.
infranken.de.309607.1: Rakoczy in Bad Kissingen: Historical costumes defy Corona
infranken.de.309607.2: Although there was no big party in the spa town, visitors and performers enjoyed the Rakoczy flair of the alternative programme.
infranken.de.309607.3: It was unusual for visitors, performers and organisers: the Rakoczy weekend without the Rakoczy festival.
infranken.de.309607.4: But: Even if the big party mile in the city center was missing, the crowds and program highlights such as Saale brennt, Rakoczy Ball or pageant, many got their money's worth with the Corona-compliant alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.5: " I think we have succeeded in spreading Rakoczy flair, " says Kurdirektor Sylvie Thormann.
infranken.de.309607.6: The guests had accepted it well.
infranken.de.309607.7: In principle, they return to the beginnings of the Rakoczy festival, when the focus of the festival was solely on history.
infranken.de.309607.9: Vesna Konhäuser and her husband have been visiting Bad Kissingen for the Rakoczy Festival for more than 25 years.
infranken.de.309607.10: This is also the case in the corona year.
infranken.de.309607.11: The couple have made themselves comfortable at the Luitpold Casino, are watching history buffs stroll around, and are listening to live Cuban music at the casino restaurant.
infranken.de.309607.12: " I also find it quite pleasant, " says Konhäuser.
infranken.de.309607.13: She does not miss the crowds that otherwise belong to Rakoczy.
infranken.de.309607.14: However, it lacks the usual programme highlights, above all Saale brennt on Friday evening as well as the historic pageant and the final fireworks display on Sunday evening.
infranken.de.309607.16: The weather would have been perfect this year, " she says.
infranken.de.309607.17: Rakoczy Equestrian Tournament to be held again
infranken.de.309607.18: For the performers of the historic spa guests, the alternative programme sometimes meant more work.
infranken.de.309607.19: For example, for Christina Gold, who takes part in the procession in a normal year and can be seen there in the carriage of the Kurgartencafé.
infranken.de.309607.20: This year she walked around the city in costume on Saturdays and Sundays.
infranken.de.309607.21: " That's more strenuous, otherwise we'll have it easier, " she says.
infranken.de.309607.22: The equestrian club had less to do, even if individual riders were out and about in the park.
infranken.de.309607.23: " We very much hope that the equestrian quadrille can take place again next year, " says the chairwoman, Ulrike Waldhofen.
infranken.de.309607.24: She announced that after a break of several years, another Rakoczy equestrian tournament will take place in 2021.
morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 corona cases at Spanish second division side Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: The Spanish second division football team CF Fuenlabrada is sliding deeper and deeper into crisis due to a corona outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: Since the newcomer from near Madrid flew to a game in the city of A Coruña on 20 July, despite the first corona cases, one low blow has followed the next.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday, 28 players or team members had tested positive, and one was hospitalized, the club reported.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Fuenlabrada from the city of the same name, south-west of Madrid, still had the chance to reach the promotion playoffs.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now there is even the threat of relegation to the B-group of the second league.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: The match against Deportivo La Coruña last Monday was cancelled at the last minute, the public prosecutor's office is investigating a possible crime against public health, and the CSD, the highest sports authority, is considering the club's forced relegation.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: Players and other team members are in quarantine in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: " They had not received a fresh towel or gel until the sixth day of the quarantine, " wrote the sports newspaper " AS. "
morgenpost.de.276358.10: Photos show how players hung up underwear and club clothes to dry in their hotel rooms after they apparently had to wash them themselves.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: Nor had the bed linen been changed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: It was neither good nor sufficient, wrote " AS. "
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club management, on the other hand, said that they were satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The accusation of deliberately endangering public health was rejected by the club's lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: The son of the President of the Spanish Primera Division, Javier Tebas, stressed that the corona rules established by the football association had not been violated, as reported by the news agency Europa Press and the sports newspaper " Marca. "
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before departure, there had been four people infected by 19 July, but they had all been isolated and had not travelled with them.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: Directly before the flight to A Coruña on Monday, all players and team members were tested again.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: When the team was already in A Coruña, the corona test was positive for " five or six " other team members.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The match was cancelled 60 minutes before kick-off, Tebas Llanas said.
mainpost.de.409271.1: Police must capture horses torn off at Dampfach
mainpost.de.409271.2: Two animals were on the road.
mainpost.de.409271.3: The police took her back to her owner.
mainpost.de.409271.4: Shortly before 6 a.m. on Sunday morning, a road user notified two free-range horses on the slip road between the Donnersdorf / Steinsfeld junction and the Theres motorway junction.
mainpost.de.409271.5: When the officers arrived, the horses were already back between the feeder road and the village of Dampfach.
mainpost.de.409271.6: Shortly before Dampfach, the officers were able to win the horses' trust, and they each had a rope carried in the patrol car put over them.
azonline.de.86610.1: Professional cyclist Tony Martin: Career continuation conceivable
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is considering a continuation of his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt / Main - Seven-time time time trial world champion Tony Martin can well imagine continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: " I am currently working with the team to define the framework conditions for how and in what form things could continue, " the 35-year-old told the " Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung. "
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by the Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and had considered ending his career after this year before the corona break.
azonline.de.86610.6: Negotiations with his team are also about the number of race days, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Or other problems that would plague him as a father, said Martin.
azonline.de.86610.8: He used to get up after a fall, and his first thought was: " Get back on your bike quickly.
azonline.de.86610.9: Today, as the father of a young daughter, I think: what if. "
azonline.de.86610.10: The professional cyclist admitted that there are certainly aspects with which he is finding it increasingly difficult.
azonline.de.86610.11: " But it was good for me to see from the Corona period what I like about cycling and how much I enjoy it. "
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist will once again be competing in the Tour de l'Ain (5 to 9 August).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four dead on the streets of Bavaria at the weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The beautiful weather attracts bikers to the streets in many places.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, the motorcycle tour ends fatally.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.5: Schönthal - Several people, mostly young people, died in accidents on Bavaria's roads over the weekend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.6: An 18-year-old motorcyclist was hit by a car on the opposite lane near Schönthal (district of Cham) on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: It was initially unclear why the car got into the opposite lane.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: On Saturday, a 22-year-old collided with a horse-drawn carriage on his machine in Upper Bavaria.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to the police, he was heading downhill near Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: He crashed into the carriage in a left-hand bend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve passengers in the carriage, one man was seriously injured and one man was slightly injured, according to the police.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: An 18-year-old died in another fatal accident in Bad Kötzting, Upper Palatinate.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: He lay down on a street on Sunday night and was overrun by a 42-year-old car driver.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: The police suspect that the 18-year-old wanted to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The driver was no longer able to brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: Near Schönberg (district of Freyung-Grafenau) on Saturday, a 57-year-old biker collided head-on with a car in a right-hand bend despite emergency braking.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.18: He died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57-year-old driver suffered a shock, leaving the other three people in the car uninjured.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.20: The safety of motorcyclists was discussed on Saturday by Bavaria's Minister of Transport, Kerstin Schreyer (CSU).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to the organiser of the biker protests against driving bans announced for August, Gabor Kovacs, the Minister referred to extensive investments such as underride protection on crash barriers and the defusing of dangerous bends.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.22: " We have achieved a great deal for the safety of motorcyclists in recent years, " the letter said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: " The number of motorised two-wheelers killed fell by around 28 percent compared to 2011. "
freiepresse.de.254098.1: Kovac tests with Monaco against Frankfurt
freiepresse.de.254098.2: Frankfurt / Main (dpa) - Football coach Niko Kovac and his new club AS Monaco will soon be reunited with Eintracht Frankfurt.
freiepresse.de.254098.3: The eight-time French champion will make a guest appearance on 1 August (6 p.m.) with the Hessians, the former club of the Croatian.
freiepresse.de.254098.4: For the Bundesliga, it is the first and only endurance test before the second leg in the Europa League against FC Basel (6 August).
freiepresse.de.254098.5: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, the match will be played without spectators.
freiepresse.de.254098.6: " We are particularly looking forward to this game.
freiepresse.de.254098.7: It's always nice to come to Frankfurt and meet friends, " explained Kovac.
freiepresse.de.254098.8: In terms of sport, this is an interesting test, said the 48-year-old.
freiepresse.de.254098.9: Before moving to FC Bayern Munich, Kovac had coached the Hessians from 2016 to 2018 and led them to victory in the DFB Cup.
freiepresse.de.254098.10: " A top-class opponent like Monaco is a good test for us with regard to the match against Basel.
freiepresse.de.254098.11: Like everyone in Frankfurt, I am looking forward to seeing Niko Kovac again, " said Eintracht Frankfurt coach Adi Hütter.
freiepresse.de.254098.12: The 50-year-old Austrian had succeeded the Croatian at Eintracht Frankfurt.
freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, the Frankfurt team lost 3-0 to Basel in their own stadium in the first leg of the round of 16.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.1: Almost 50 new infections: Hof district narrowly misses lockdown
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.2: In the district of Hof, the number of known new corona infections increased further over the weekend: from 39 on Friday and 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and is no longer included in these statistics) to 47 on Sunday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.3: In addition, there is a case in the town of Hof.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.4: The Hof area is thus approaching the critical threshold of 50 new infections per 100,000 inhabitants per week.
euronews-de.199228.1: 700 dead due to monsoon rains in Southeast Asia
euronews-de.199228.2: More than 9 million people have been affected by the severe floods in Southeast Asia, primarily in Bangladesh, India and Nepal.
euronews-de.199228.3: A total of 700 people lost their lives due to the heavy monsoon rain.
euronews-de.199228.4: In Bangladesh, the Red Crescent is trying to reach isolated people in boats.
euronews-de.199228.6: The farmers have lost their crops.
euronews-de.199228.7: Armored rhinoceroses in National Park die from landslides
euronews-de.199228.8: In Kaziranga National Park, several of the 120 rhinoceroses were killed by landslides.
euronews-de.199228.9: They are under protection and are considered to be at risk of extinction.
euronews-de.199228.10: This year, the floods are particularly severe, which scientists attribute to climate change.
euronews-de.199228.11: According to the United Nations, Bangladesh is one of the countries most affected by global warming.
euronews-de.199228.13: In the village of Cox's Bazar in the south of Bangladesh, the state has built homes for 650 people displaced by the floods.
euronews-de.199228.14: So far, only a few have moved in.
euronews-de.199228.15: It is difficult to bring people to Cox's Bazar.
euronews-de.199228.17: Anyone who used to have a house, no matter how small it was and resembled a hut, often does not want to spend their lives in a large apartment block.
euronews-de.199228.18: Many homes are empty, but - as the government wants it - they will soon be occupied by those who have lost their homes as a result of the floods.

handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The new demands could not be met, the Ministry of Economy in Buenos Aires announced on Saturday.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: " That would not only be irresponsible, but also unfair, " it said in a statement.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: " While 50 percent of children in Argentina live in poverty, we cannot increase the short-term profits of our creditors. "
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debts of the second largest economy in South America are no longer sustainable under current conditions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: For this reason, Argentina is demanding that its private creditors waive part of their claims of around 66 billion US dollars (around 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: If no agreement is reached, the country is once again threatened with bankruptcy.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: It would be the ninth default in Argentina's history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Lenders recently called for higher interest rates on government bonds and changes to some contractual clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: However, the Argentine government is sticking to its latest offer and is not prepared to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is in the midst of a severe financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The inflation rate recently stood at more than 50 percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: For the current year, experts predict a decline in economic power of around ten percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: At the end of May, Argentina had not settled interest claims amounting to 503 million US dollars and had thus slipped into a limited default.
pnp.de.390078.2: " It's going really well " - this is the conclusion drawn by Dr Stefanie Kramer after her first days in the notary's office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end, everything went very quickly: in mid-May, Dr Stefanie Kramer learned that she was going to succeed Lutz Feller in the notarial office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.4: Just six weeks later, at the beginning of July, the doctor of law began work, and normal day-to-day business has long been in full swing.
pnp.de.390078.5: " However, I still have to arrive privately, " she explains in an interview with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: Of course, the short lead time was not enough to completely relocate the centre of life from Regensburg to Eggenfelden, reports the Dingolfing native.
pnp.de.390078.7: Together with her husband, who works as a judge at the Regional Court in Regensburg, she is currently looking for a suitable apartment or house in the city.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband was able to apply for parental leave at short notice in order to be able to take care of their two daughters (3 ½ and 1 ½ years old).
pnp.de.390078.9: In order not to have to commute from Regensburg every day, the 39-year-old explains that for the time being she also has accommodation with her parents in Dingolfing.
pnp.de.390078.10: Having grown up in the neighbouring district, she has of course long been familiar with the town of Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.11: During on-site visits with her family over the past few months, she has once again discovered that " Eggenfelden is a really beautiful small town. "
pnp.de.390078.12: She was all the more pleased that she had won the race in the selection process for the vacant position.
pnp.de.390078.13: Her native Lower Bavaria also plays a central role in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's professional career: After studying law in Passau, she completed her legal traineeship and the second state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several positions as a notary assessor, including in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in the Unterallgäu and Regensburg - during which time she also " incidentally " shouldered her doctorate in employment law - she took up her first position as a notary in Rotthalmünster in the district of Passau in 2012.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016 she took parental leave, which was followed by a move to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then she has taken over representation services in various notarial offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the position in Eggenfelden was advertised due to the approaching retirement of Lutz Feller, the 39-year-old explained that the time had come for her full return to work.
pnp.de.390078.18: The team of her predecessor, who will take over the holiday replacement in the notarial office in the future, has completely taken over Dr. Stefanie Kramer - and immediately has praise for the firm's team: " It's going really well! "
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on well-coordinated processes here makes it easier for her to take care of the upcoming relocation of her private centre of life.
pnp.de.390078.20: In terms of nursery and nursery places, she has already made contact with a local institution.
pnp.de.390078.21: And if everything goes as planned, she hopes to be able to pursue her hobby here soon - and get to know the most beautiful jogging routes in the Rottal.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans to start the league with a maximum of 15,000 spectators
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund The largest German football stadium in Dortmund will not even be 20 percent full at the start of the season if fans return.
an-online.de.487062.3: " Due to the distance regulation, which must be adhered to, we are currently planning with 12,000 to 15,000 spectators, " said Borussia Dortmund's managing director Carsten Cramer to the " Tagesspiegel. "
an-online.de.487062.4: Normally, the arena in the district town holds slightly more than 81,000 spectators for Bundesliga matches.
an-online.de.487062.5: In the ghost games last season caused by the COVID-19 pandemic, BVB lost around four million euros per game.
an-online.de.487062.6: Cramer, who is responsible for marketing, digitalisation and internationalisation at BVB, hopes that in addition to the normal spectator seats, some of the approximately 4000 seats in the hospitality sector can also be opened again: " It is of course a blow to the office if these revenues are completely lost. "
an-online.de.487062.7: In view of the ongoing COVID-19 crisis, everyone is currently " well advised to take a stable page first. "
an-online.de.487062.8: " If many companies are not doing well and 6.8 million people in Germany alone are on short-time work, then the need for entertainment is limited, " explained Cramer.
an-online.de.487062.9: The head of marketing in Dortmund praised the BVB pros for their partial salary waiver, which is intended to help overcome the crisis: " Of course, the players know that their salary waiver has a different effect than if we put 100 people working in merchandising on short-time work. "
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: an early start to life with a few hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Hardly heavier than a packet of butter, just three tablespoons of blood in his entire body: that was Gabriel when he was born - he weighed exactly 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The boy is one of around 400 premature babies who are cared for at the children's hospital in Graz every year.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1,500 grams, and a few - such as Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael - are extremely light weights weighing less than one kilogram.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are so small and so early born that neither lungs, nor intestines, nor muscles are fully developed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Their skin is sometimes so soft that they could injure the electrodes of an ECG.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they are so tiny that they sometimes wear doll clothes and mini diapers made especially for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they don't have a voice - " and how, " smiles Berndt Urlesberger.
kurier.at.204565.9: " Even if, of course, they don't scream quite as loudly as large babies. "
schwaebische-post.de.62177.1: When the whiteboard becomes a stage
schwaebische-post.de.62177.2: Despite Corona Theater in the classroom: Shortly before the start of the holidays, the 9th grade of the Sankt-Jakobus-Gymnasium in Abtsgmünd experienced the whiteboard as a stage.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.3: Actress Julia Sylvester from the Theater der Stadt Aalen presented the pupils with the production " Das Heimatkleid " - via video.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.4: Afterwards, the pupils were able to discuss the play and the performance with actress and director Winfried Tobias via Skype.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.5: The idea for the performance format was born from the current corona situation.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teacher Teresa Nar was delighted with the enrichment of the lessons.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even if all those involved agreed in the end that the direct encounter in the theatre and the stage would offer additional stimuli, the potential for contact with the schools can also be seen in the theatre.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: " If we continue to improve the technical framework, it could be an interesting addition to the programme, " emphasised director Winfried Tobias.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.1: First round drawn: TSV 1860 would face Eintracht Frankfurt in the DFB Cup
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.2: Should TSV 1860 qualify for the DFB Cup, the Lions will face Eintracht Frankfurt in the first round.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.3: This was the result of the draw on Sunday.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.4: Munich - Sixty possible opponents in the first round of the DFB Cup have been determined.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.5: The Lions would face Eintracht Frankfurt if they qualified successfully.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.6: This was the result of the draw on Sunday evening in the ARD sports show.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.7: Because the field of participants is not yet complete due to the COVID-19 pandemic, placeholders were used in the draw.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.8: Due to the voluntary waiver of semi-final opponent FC Memmingen, TSV 1860 is already in the final of the Bavarian Toto Cup (4 or 5 September).
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.9: There the Lions will face either Würzburger Kickers or Viktoria Aschaffenburg.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.10: Should second division climber Würzburg reach the final, Sixty would already be firmly qualified for the first round of the DFB Cup.

abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.12: The first round of the DFB Cup will take place between 11 and 14 September, one week before the third-league start.
mz-web.de.376296.1: " Gone with the wind ": film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead
mz-web.de.376296.2: Film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.
mz-web.de.376296.3: She died of natural causes in Paris on Sunday at the age of 104, confirmed her spokeswoman for the German Press Agency.
mz-web.de.376296.4: De Havilland was known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the Southern epic " Gone with the Wind " (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born in Tokyo to British parents, Olivia de Havilland moved to California as an infant.
mz-web.de.376296.6: The Austrian theater man Max Reinhardt discovered the 19-year-old in the role of Hermia in Shakespeare's " Midsummer Night's Dream. "
mz-web.de.376296.7: The Warner Brothers film studio signed her for seven years and brought her to prominence alongside Eroll Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She made eight films with the heartbreaker.
mz-web.de.376296.9: In 1946 she won her first Oscar in the leading role of " To Each His Own. "
mz-web.de.376296.10: The film was shown in Germany under the title " Mutterherz. "
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later she received the award for best actress in William Wyler's " The Heiress. "
mz-web.de.376296.12: She also received a lot of recognition as a neurotic eccentric in " Der dunkle Spiegel " and " Die Schlangengrube. "
mz-web.de.376296.13: Daphne du Maurier suggested her in 1952 for the leading role in the film adaptation of her novel " My Cousin Rachel. "
mz-web.de.376296.14: The play was a worldwide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: She played in " Lullaby for a Corpse " with her long-time friend Bette Davis.
mz-web.de.376296.16: His marriage to the writer Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953) produced his son Benjamin.
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married the journalist Pierre Paul Galante and had his daughter Gisèle with him.
mz-web.de.376296.19: Rumors of an affair with former British Prime Minister Edward Heath have never been confirmed.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.1: " Road to Timmendorf ": Beach volleyball: Thole / Wickler miss final on comeback
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.2: World Championship runners-up Julius Thole and Clemens Wickler missed the final of the beach volleyball tournament " Road to Timmendorf. "
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.3: At the meeting of the top teams in Dusseldorf they lost in the semi-final to their national team colleagues Nils Ehlers and Lars Flüggen with 1: 2 (17: 21, 21: 17, 19: 21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.4: Most recently, Thole / Wickler played at the World Tour Final in Rome in September of last year.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.5: In the final on the Rhine, their conquerors Ehlers / Flüggen suffered a defeat 0: 2 (17: 21, 17: 21) against the surprise team Lukas Pfretschner and his interim partner Steven van de Velde.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.6: In addition to the show tournament, three starting places for the German Championships were played out in Timmendorfer Strand at the beginning of September: Tickets were secured by Armin Dollinger / Simon Kulzer, Manuel Harms / Richard Peemüller and Simon Pfretschner / Milan Sievers.
paz-online.de.95211.1: Kalbitz's expulsion from AfD confirmed - FDP speaks of " Feigenblatt "
paz-online.de.95211.2: From the point of view of the FDP, the expulsion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is just a " fig leaf " and does not change the character of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.3: " The AfD is the parliamentary arm of the far right in Germany.
paz-online.de.95211.4: Andreas Kalbitz is only part of the tip of the iceberg of the radicals in the AfD, " FDP politician Benjamin Strasser told the dpa news agency in Berlin.
paz-online.de.95211.5: On Saturday in Stuttgart, after several hours of hearings, the Federal Arbitration Court of the AfD confirmed the expulsion of Kalbitz, which was decided by a majority of the Federal Executive Board in May.
paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD faction in the Brandenburg state parliament.
paz-online.de.95211.7: " If the AfD really wanted to consistently remove right-wing extremists from their party, functionaries such as Björn Höcke and his supporters would have been excluded long ago, " said Strasser.
paz-online.de.95211.8: " However, there is no political will in the AfD to do so, because right-wing extremism is now part of the party. "
paz-online.de.95211.9: CSU General Secretary Markus Blume expressed a similar view: " The fact that Andreas Kalbitz is now excluded says nothing and does not change anything, " he told " Welt am Sonntag. "
paz-online.de.95211.10: " It speaks volumes how many frenetic supporters a right-wing extremist in the midst of the AfD still has. "
paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume assumes that the AfD will again end up under five percent in future elections.
paz-online.de.95211.12: " The AfD's days in parliament are numbered. "
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the spokesmen of the now officially dissolved " wing " around the Thuringian AfD regional and parliamentary party chairman Björn Höcke; the Office for the Protection of the Constitution classifies the tone as a " certain right-wing extremist endeavor. "
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD national executive threw Kalbitz out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: The reason he gave was that when he joined the party, Kalbitz did not state that he had previously been a member of the now banned far-right " Heimattreue Deutsche Jugend " (HDJ) or of the Republicans.
paz-online.de.95211.16: Kalbitz denies membership in the HDJ.
paz-online.de.95211.17: The chairman of the left-wing parliamentary group in the Brandenburg state parliament, Sebastian Walter, also stressed that the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court did not change the character of the AfD: " The wolf has only eaten chalk.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD remains a far-right party, with or without Kalbitz. "
paz-online.de.95211.19: This decision would neither weaken the federal party nor the right wing.
paz-online.de.95211.20: " The manoeuvre of the Meuthen troops is transparent.
paz-online.de.95211.21: They want to avoid further observation by the Office for the Protection of the Constitution and try to get through under the radar, " said Walter.
paz-online.de.95211.22: " The AfD cannot rid itself of the ghosts it has invoked.
paz-online.de.95211.23: Being kicked out won't change anything, " commented Brandenburg SPD General Secretary Erik Stohn on the decision in the Kalbitz case.
paz-online.de.95211.24: " Here, the AfD regional association and the parliamentary group have remained their right-wing leader to this day. "
paz-online.de.95211.25: The legal battle over Kalbitz's membership in the AfD will continue.
paz-online.de.95211.26: The latter announced on Saturday that he would now take civil action against the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court.
paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea wind farms provide a good 21 percent more electricity
paz-online.de.95234.2: The wind power plants on the German North Sea fed 11.51 terawatt hours of electricity into the grid in the first six months of the year.
paz-online.de.95234.3: This is a good 21 percent more than in the same period last year, according to network operator Tennet in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: Tennet is responsible for the transmission of North Sea electricity to the mainland and its transmission through the German electricity grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: The wind turbines on the Baltic Sea, which are not part of Tennet's grid area, have fed in a further 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: Overall, wind power from the North and Baltic Seas thus comes to 13.73 TWh, compared to a good 11.64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: The wind harvest at sea thus accounts for almost 19 percent of total wind power in Germany; that is about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms ensure higher generation capacities
paz-online.de.95234.9: In addition to wind conditions, the increased contribution of offshore wind energy results from higher generation capacities because new wind farms have been connected to the grid over the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1270 wind power plants in the North Sea were all running at full power at the same time, they could mathematically generate 6.7 gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient for this, amounting to 7.1 gigawatts, according to Tennet.
paz-online.de.95234.12: It is expected to increase to 17 gigawatts in the German North Sea by 2030.
paz-online.de.95234.13: " In Germany and the Netherlands, we will invest 20 billion euros in the expansion of offshore grid connections by then, " said Tennet Managing Director Tim Meyerjürgens.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, even at sea, wind farms cannot make full use of their capacity, reaching around 40 percent.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The previous record day this year is 2 January, when the North Sea wind farms generated more than six gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, the North Sea wind turbines produce around 2.5 to 3.0 gigawatts of electricity, which corresponds to three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: This would enable almost seven million households to be supplied with electricity.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.1: Art " Skirmish " - an exhibition by the Leipzig artist Christian Bold in the gallery of the Gmünder Kunstverein.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.2: It was almost a small celebration of the 130th anniversary.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.3: Birthday of the Gmünder Kunstverein: The exhibition opening " Skirmish " with works by the Leipzig artist Christian Bold went beyond the usual framework after the corona break.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.4: Many more art lovers than usual followed the dialogue between the artist and the chairman of the Kunstverein, Professor Dr. Klaus Ripper.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.5: The musical equivalent was provided by the band " Defenders of the Universe " on southern Kornhausplatz.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.6: North of the gallery, the " Sandtogether " association was involved.
dnn-online.de.39567.1: Freital: Windbergfest cancelled due to corona
dnn-online.de.39567.2: The Windberg Festival will not take place this year.
dnn-online.de.39567.3: The town of Freital has cancelled the three-day festival planned for September.
dnn-online.de.39567.4: In other years, more than 30,000 people attended this city festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.5: " We really did not make this decision easy for ourselves and - aware of how difficult it is economically for those involved - hoped until the last minute, " explained Mayor Uwe Rumberg (non-partisan).
dnn-online.de.39567.6: " But ultimately, as organisers, we are responsible for the health of many thousands of people. "
dnn-online.de.39567.7: If tens of thousands had flocked to the festival grounds and the marquee, it would not have been possible to comply with minimum distances, hygiene regulations and contact tracking in accordance with the current corona protection regulation.
dnn-online.de.39567.8: Or the restrictions would have been so severe that not much would have been left of a folk festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.9: In addition, the organisational and monitoring effort would increase disproportionately many times over.
dnn-online.de.39567.10: Rumberg looked forward to next year.
dnn-online.de.39567.11: The town of Freital will then be celebrating its 100th anniversary with the Winterberg Festival from 7 to 9 May 2021 and the Day of the Saxons from 10 to 12 September 2021, among other events.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.1: Olympic Dressage Champion Werth unbeatable in Achleiten
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.2: Achleiten - Six-time Olympic champion Isabell Werth was the outstanding rider at the dressage tournament in Achleiten, Austria.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.3: The 51-year-old from Rheinberg scored four victories in four starts at the weekend.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.4: After winning a Grand Prix at the start with Weihegold and Quantaz, she was also unbeatable in the Grand Prix Special and the Freestyle on Sunday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.5: On the 15-year-old mare Weihegold, Werth clearly prevailed in the Special on Sunday against the Austrian Victoria Max-Theurer on Abegglen.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.6: The German was also clearly ahead of her 34-year-old pupil Victoria Max-Theurer in the freestyle on Quantaz on Saturday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.7: Werth's winning horse, Quantaz, belongs to Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.8: The most successful dressage rider in the world is to establish the ten-year-old stallion in the Grand Prix.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.9: For Quantaz it was the first freestyle ever.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.10: Werth had already won all four important tests at the first tournament in Achleiten three weeks ago.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.11: The last of the three international tournaments is scheduled to take place there from 14 to 16 August.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.1: More air traffic controllers in Worms in the future
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: Worms University continues to take to the skies: " DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung " endows a professorship for " Air Traffic Management. "
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding contract between the university and DFS has now been signed in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The contract was initially concluded for three years and will start in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: The professorship makes it possible to start your studies not only in the summer semester, but also in the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This means that twice as many students can be trained as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, capacities at both the university and the DFS Air Navigation Academy are being used to their full potential.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: DFS will advise the university on the establishment and appointment of the professorship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: Since the summer semester of 2019, the first students have been enrolled in the Air Traffic Management degree programme as part of their training as air traffic controllers at Worms University of Applied Sciences.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: Nine students have already started this year.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: So far, the experience of DFS has been very positive, and the achievements of the students are outstanding.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of studies and pilot training makes a significant contribution to further increasing the attractiveness of the pilot profession.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: " In these times, funding is not easy for us economically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: However, we firmly expect air traffic to recover and grow again in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: In order to be able to fulfil our legal mandate in the future, we need highly qualified personnel, " said Professor Klaus-Dieter Scheurle, Chairman and CEO of DFS, at the signing ceremony.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: " For DFS, the endowed professorship is a future-proof investment that will provide air traffic controllers with a broad, interdisciplinary knowledge base in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.18: We are therefore continuing the good cooperation with the university and at the same time underpinning our attractiveness as an employer. "
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.19: This is also underlined by Professor Dr. Jens Hermsdorf, President of Worms University of Applied Sciences: " The endowed professorship forms an important bridge between science and industry.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.20: With it, we would like to build on the existing cooperation with DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung as a practical partner for the dual bachelor's programme in Air Traffic Management. "
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.21: The trust of German air traffic control is both a motivation and an obligation for Worms University of Applied Sciences to further expand its teaching and research expertise in the future-oriented fields of aviation.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.22: Working for the air traffic controllers of tomorrow, the university can set very special highlights and innovative priorities for its students with the first endowed professorship for a dual course of study.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.23: Dr. Denis Alt, State Secretary in the Ministry of Science, Continuing Education and Culture, emphasises: " With its focus on aviation, Worms University of Applied Sciences has a unique selling point in Rhineland-Palatinate.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.24: Today's signing of the cooperation agreement strengthens the university's profile. "
main-netz.de.61826.1: Rescue screwdriver lands on the A45

main-netz.de.61826.3: A 76-year-old drove a Ford straight ahead in the bend at the Alzenau-Mitte exit at around 12.40 and landed on the guardrail.
main-netz.de.61826.4: The impact triggered the front airbags, causing the driver to suffer minor facial injuries and having to be taken to a hospital for treatment.
main-netz.de.61826.5: The injuries to the 72-year-old co-driver were treated by an emergency doctor and the patient was then flown to a hospital by rescue helicopter.
main-netz.de.61826.6: At present, however, the police assume that there is no danger to life.
main-netz.de.61826.7: The damaged vehicle, which suffered damage of around 2,000 euros, had to be towed away.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.1: Heil wants to examine other sectors after the meat industry
mittelbayerische.de.307327.2: The COVID-19 crisis brought the situation in parts of the meat industry to light once again.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.4: But are they right - and will they remain so?
mittelbayerische.de.307327.5: Following the now planned strict regulations against abuses in the meat industry, Federal Minister of Labour Hubertus Heil (SPD) wants to examine other sectors as well.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.6: " We will look at industry by industry and then take appropriate measures for the respective industry if necessary, " Heil told the German Press Agency in Berlin.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.7: Germany's employers are already warning against restricting work contracts in general.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.8: Following the mass outbreak of corona at meat giant Tönnies in North Rhine-Westphalia, the Federal Cabinet wants to pass a law by Heil this Wednesday.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.9: Large-scale slaughterhouses should no longer be allowed to employ external personnel for slaughter, cutting and meat processing.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.10: To this end, the use of contract and temporary workers is to be banned there.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.11: Employer President Ingo Kramer told dpa: " Stay away from a general restriction on work contracts and temporary employment if you do not want to strangle the economy completely. "
mittelbayerische.de.307327.12: Contracts for work and services are, for example, the essential basis for creating added value for customers in a wide range of trades, the construction industry and plant engineering.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.13: " The mistakes of individuals cannot destroy such an important instrument. "
mittelbayerische.de.307327.14: Heil assured: " My aim is not to ban contracts for work and services everywhere in the German economy. "
mittelbayerische.de.307327.15: Contracts for work and services make sense.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.16: " If an industrial company commissions a tradesman to install a security system, this is a completely normal work contract. "
mittelbayerische.de.307327.17: The German meat industry considers a ban on work contracts and temporary agency work to be unconstitutional in its sector alone.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.18: According to a statement on the proposed law, the " Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung " (Saturday) reports that it is not possible to explain why different labour laws should apply to the portioning and packaging of cheese in the future than to sausages.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.19: In the event of a ban, the consumer price would rise by 10 to 20 percent per kilo and product.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.20: According to the results of an audit by the North Rhine-Westphalia Occupational Safety and Health Administration, many Eastern European employees from contractors worked in the sector, sometimes 16 hours a day.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.22: Wages were withheld for protective equipment or rent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.23: It was also noted that the situation regarding the accommodation of employees was often miserable.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.24: Heil said that a relatively strict law for the meat industry had already come into force in 2017.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.25: However, these have been circumvented by " tricky constructions. "
mittelbayerische.de.307327.26: " A fundamental clean-up is now required. "
mittelbayerische.de.307327.27: The politician announced: " The Occupational Safety and Health Act, which we want to pass in the Cabinet at the end of July, also includes measures that not only affect the meat industry - for example, higher examination rates for occupational safety and health or clear criteria for communal accommodation. "
mittelbayerische.de.307327.28: The draft presented to dpa includes amendments to the Act on the Protection of Workers' Rights in the Meat Industry and the Occupational Health and Safety Act.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.29: Brandenburg's consumer protection minister, Ursula Nonnemacher (Green Party), believes that more intensive controls are necessary.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.30: " I would like us to be able to carry out even more checks in many supervisory areas: food inspections, animal welfare, everything possible, including animal transport, for example, " said Nonnemacher on Sunday in the RBB programme " Brandenburg aktuell. "
mittelbayerische.de.307327.31: However, more personnel positions are also needed for more checks.

hna.de.247362.1: Car flips over: Young woman seriously injured in an accident on federal highway 83 near Hofgeismar
hna.de.247362.2: A 21-year-old suffered serious injuries in an accident between Schöneberg and Hümme on Sunday at around 1: 25 p.m.
hna.de.247362.3: She was taken to the hospital in Kassel.
hna.de.247362.4: The fire brigade used thermal imaging cameras to look for potential passengers.
hna.de.247362.5: According to the police, the woman was driving on federal highway 83 in the direction of her home town of Hümme when, for reasons yet unknown, her car drifted off the road and rolled over several times.
hna.de.247362.6: In order to save the accident victim, the fire brigade had to clear the roof of the car.
hna.de.247362.7: Since it was unclear whether anyone was still in the vehicle, the adjacent maize field was scanned from the turntable ladder with a thermal imaging camera.
hna.de.247362.8: The drone squadron from Warburg, which also works with thermal imaging cameras, had also been ordered to search for people.
hna.de.247362.9: However, the volunteers did not find anyone between the tall maize plants.
hna.de.247362.10: The seriously injured woman was taken by ambulance to the hospital in Kassel for further treatment.
hna.de.247362.11: Almost 50 firefighters from the Hofgeismar, Hümme and Schöneberg fire brigades were on site.
hna.de.247362.12: The main road was closed for two hours due to the accident.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.2: Turin - After a redeeming goal by Cristiano Ronaldo, record champion Juventus Turin has secured the Italian championship for the ninth time in a row.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.3: The team around the five-time world football player completed the 36th Scudetto in the club's history with a score of 2: 0 (1: 0) on Sunday evening in their home game against Sampdoria Genoa.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.5: With 83 points, Turin, which competed without former international Sami Khedira, who was recently injured for a long time, can no longer be pushed out of first place two match days before the end of the Serie A season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.6: Inter Milan, second in the standings, is seven points behind.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.7: Juventus were harmless despite their optical superiority in the first half, then Ronaldo scored with the final action after a free kick variant.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.8: The 35-year-old scored a pass from Miralem Pjanic directly from the boundary of the penalty area with a flat shot (45 + 7).
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.9: Against the now more offensive guests, Ronaldo was also involved in the 2-0, with Federico Bernardeschi (67) gathering dust after his shot.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.10: This ensured the lackluster but decisive success.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.11: The foul in the 89th minute, which was missed to the bar, was probably only the fault of Ronaldo himself with regard to the goal scorer's score.
