lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.14: Above all, the mental exhaustion of his players is great, said the Juve coach.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.15: Due to the defeat, the team from Turin had not yet been able to complete the championship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.16: In the end, Juve's reassuring lead at the top of the standings was mainly due to the weakness of his competitors.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.17: In the eleven games leading up to Sunday's game, the Sarri team had only managed to score five wins.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.18: Whether Ronaldo will also become the top scorer is questionable.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.19: While the Portuguese superstar has so far scored 31 goals, the former Dortmunder Ciro Immobile has already scored 34 goals after his hat-trick in the 5: 1 (1: 1) of the table fourth Lazio Rome at the Hellas Verona - as many as Robert Lewandowski contributed to the title win of FC Bayern.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.20: The record in Italy is held by the current Juventus pro Gonzalo Higuaín.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.21: The Argentinean scored 36 goals for SSC Napoli in the 2015 / 2016 season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.22: In August, the " old lady " of Italian football will have her next chance at winning the title.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.23: Juventus are in the last 16 of the Champions League, but will have to make up for a 0-1 first-leg defeat against Olympique Lyon on 7 August in order to reach the final tournament in Lisbon.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.24: In the next knockout round, Real Madrid or Manchester City would wait as opponents.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.1: Baden-Württemberg: Over 250 illegal car races recorded
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.2: Stuttgart - Despite all the threatened penalties and court rulings, drivers continue to step on the gas in countless illegal races on the roads of Baden-Württemberg: In the past year and the first four months of this year, the police in the south-west have already registered more than 250 illegal car races.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.3: There are no comparable figures for previous years, but the speeders are increasingly making work for the judicial authorities: A total of 155 investigations into illegal races were conducted at the public prosecutor's offices between Konstanz and Mannheim in 2018, a year later there were already 252 and in the current year by the beginning of June 151.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.4: The races were less about organised events, as can be seen from the response of the Ministry of the Interior to an inquiry by the Landtag-SPD.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.5: In most cases, the drivers competed against each other spontaneously or fled from the police - this is also reported as an illegal race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.6: The drivers were mainly German men between the ages of 18 and 60.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.8: Only in comparatively few cases are speeders caught and asked to pay: According to the Ministry of the Interior, a total of 113 fines have been imposed and 15 prison sentences handed down since 2018.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.9: However, there are no indications that the number of illegal car races is actually increasing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.10: On the contrary, other drivers reacted more sensitively than in the past due to the numerous tragic accidents and lawsuits, and reported more frequently, said a ministry spokesman.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.11: Autobahn 8 is particularly popular with racers. Again and again, drivers brake the traffic there in order to make room for themselves and use the free track for a race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.12: Last August, a dozen drivers were caught near Kirchheim unter Teck; three months earlier, there were as many as 18 drivers on the A8 near Merklingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.13: The A81 is the most popular " race track "
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.14: The police even register more races on the A81 than on any other federal motorway.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.15: With a speed limit, an attempt is being made to slow down the speeders on the particularly affected section between Engen and Geisingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.16: The mostly high-priced and pimped-up sports and luxury cars often have Swiss license plates because drivers resort to racing in Germany because of the high penalties for driving too fast and car racing in the neighbouring country.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.17: For the SPD, the speed limit must not be reduced to a few routes: " With a general speed limit of 130 kilometres per hour, we would get rid of this problem on motorways, " says Martin Rivoir, the traffic expert for the SPD parliamentary group.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.18: " The inhibition threshold for speeders would be significantly higher if you were not allowed to travel legally here and there at 200 kilometres per hour or more. "
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.19: Rivoir thinks less of education or image campaigns: " Anyone who ignores all the rules in this way and puts not only their own lives, but also the lives of other road users at risk, can hardly be reached with reason. "
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.20: ADAC calls for stronger police crackdown
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.21: However, this is not enough for the ADAC: " We assume that racers will not be deterred by the speed limits, " says Holger Bach, Head of Transport and Environment at ADAC Württemberg.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.22: He is calling for additional and tougher checks on the affected routes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.23: Not infrequently, the high-speed trial of strength turns into painful and momentous seriousness: Since January 2019 and until April 2020, three people across the country have died in the races, two of them innocent bystanders in a night-time crash in the centre of Stuttgart and one in Gerlingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.24: Two young men are said to have competed in a car race there in November.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.25: One of the vehicles came off the road, crashed into a garden wall and stopped on its side, and the 18-year-old co-driver died.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.26: 21 other people have been injured in the races over the past two years.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.27: However, in the opinion of Minister of the Interior Thomas Strobl, stricter penalties are not necessary: " There is no need for legislative action to sanction illegal motor vehicle races more severely, " says the paper of the Ministry of the Interior.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.1: Blue light from 23 July: Thirsty burglar steals drinks from snack bar
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.2: Rohrdorf: A man broke into a snack bar in Rohrdorf (Calw district) on Thursday and stole drinks and cash.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.3: A witness heard noises in Talstraße at around 3.40 a.m. and ran in the direction of the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.4: There he noticed a man who helped himself with drinks from the fridge and then left the snack bar through a previously smashed front door.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.5: The perpetrator fled in the direction of the meadows behind the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.6: According to the police, the burglar also made use of a cash register and stole cash in the low three-digit range.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.7: The suspect is described as follows: He is about 1.75 to 1.80 meters tall and of strong stature.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.8: In fact, he was wearing a black hoodie, black trousers and light shoes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.9: The police will receive further evidence from witnesses.
pnp.de.390142.1: Ackermann sprints to victory on the final stage of the Sibiu Tour
pnp.de.390142.2: Professional cyclist Pascal Ackermann took his second day victory on the final stage of the 10th Sibiu Tour.
pnp.de.390142.3: The 26-year-old from Palatinate from the Bora-hansgrohe team prevailed in a bunch sprint on the 109-kilometre section with start and finish in Sibiu, having already won a stage on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.4: These were season victories three and four for Ackermann.
pnp.de.390142.5: His Austrian team mate Gregor Mühlberger came out on top in the overall standings.
pnp.de.390142.6: The 26-year-old confidently won the mountain time trial in the morning, taking the lead in the classification.
pnp.de.390142.7: Only 104 riders were left for the final stage in the evening.
pnp.de.390142.8: No fewer than 18 starters had fallen victim to the time limit in the mountain time trial.
pnp.de.390142.9: " I'm really happy to start the new season with a win, " Ackermann said after his success on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.10: " The sprint was really hectic, " said the 26-year-old.
pnp.de.390142.11: With 300 metres to go, he simply put on his sprint, " and it worked out perfectly. "
pnp.de.390142.12: In accordance with the rules of the UCI, all race participants and their companions underwent a corona test six days before the start of the race.
pnp.de.390142.13: During the entire tour, drivers and carers were separated from the organisation team and the media in isolated hygiene bubbles.
pnp.de.390142.14: Spectators at the start and finish were not allowed.
bild.254818.1: Control centre issued instructions for lay resuscitation
bild.254818.2: Düsseldorf - Tragic accident on Sunday afternoon in Düsseldorf-Garath.
bild.254818.3: In an apartment building, a child (4) suddenly lay lifeless in the water while bathing.
bild.254818.4: According to the fire brigade, the emergency call was received shortly before 1 p.m.
bild.254818.5: " A dispatcher from the control centre immediately gave instructions for amateur resuscitation, " a fire service spokesman told BILD.
bild.254818.6: The arriving rescue forces took over the resuscitation measures a little later.
bild.254818.7: The child, whose life was in danger, was transported to the university hospital under resuscitation.
bild.254818.8: It is unclear why the accident occurred.
bild.254818.9: The police have routinely started investigations into the course of the accident.
bild.254818.10: The fire service spokesman: " We are assuming a tragic accident in the apartment. "
infranken.de.309656.1: Nuremberg: Unauthorised tuning meeting - police intervene, 700 vehicles and around 1100 people
infranken.de.309656.2: Hundreds of cars and at times more than 1000 people took part in a " tuning meeting " on Saturday night in the parking lot of a furniture store.
infranken.de.309656.3: The police implemented their announcement that they would increase their control of such events.
infranken.de.309656.4: A major tuning meeting took place on Saturday evening (25 July 2020) in the south of Nuremberg.
infranken.de.309656.6: According to the police of Middle Franconia, the Nuremberg traffic police noticed an increased number of vehicles in the area of a large car park in Ingolstädter Straße at around 10: 30 p.m.
infranken.de.309656.7: As a result, the police carried out a large number of vehicle inspections there.
infranken.de.309656.8: Only recently, the police announced that they would step up their efforts to combat so-called autoposers.
infranken.de.309656.9: Illegal tuning meeting in Nuremberg: Only a small part of the " scene "
infranken.de.309656.10: At the top of the list were around 700 vehicles and around 1100 people, according to the police.
infranken.de.309656.11: Of these, however, only a small proportion of those present can be attributed to the " autoposer " and tuning scene.
infranken.de.309656.12: Apparently, the majority of the relevant scene complied with the police's appeal.
infranken.de.309656.13: On the basis of the vehicles and people on site, it can be assumed that these were mainly onlookers.
infranken.de.309656.14: In addition, the vast majority of those present complied with the applicable infection protection regulations, in particular compliance with the minimum distance and wearing a mouth-nose protection.
infranken.de.309656.15: The control measures carried out on site were completed at around 1: 00 a.m.
infranken.de.309656.16: In total, the officials noticed such structural changes to 10 vehicles that the operating permit had expired.
infranken.de.309656.17: Four of these vehicles had to be secured.
infranken.de.309656.19: There were no illegal car races.
infranken.de.309656.20: " The police headquarters in Middle Franconia will continue to keep an eye on what is happening and will continue to carry out increased control measures, also in connection with the arrival of onlookers, " it said.
infranken.de.309656.21: The News5 agency spoke to Jürgen Schrödinger from the towing company involved: " They all have beautiful rims, we must not scratch them, " says Schrödinger.
infranken.de.309656.22: Special tapes are used for this purpose.
infranken.de.309656.23: Also because the cars are wider, the company must take care not to cause any damage.
infranken.de.309656.24: " After all, the young people should get their cars back undamaged. "
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.1: Employment Agency figures: 900 suspected cases of abuse of short-time work
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.2: Berlin - According to its own statement, the Federal Employment Agency (BA) is investigating around 900 suspected cases of misuse of short-time work allowances.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.3: " With more than 880,000 companies reporting short-time work, this is extremely low, " said Daniel Terzenbach, the managing director responsible for operations, to the " Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung. "
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.4: When, at the start of the COVID-19 crisis, a large number of companies suddenly applied for short-time work, the BA had to react quickly.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.5: Normally, the examination can take up to three weeks.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.6: " We didn't have that much time at our disposal in this critical phase.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.7: We will therefore take a closer look at the final accounts.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.8: There will certainly be a lot more to come.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.9: We are not naive about this and have a lot of staying power. "
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.10: Indications of abuse often come from the affected employees or trade unions.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.11: In addition, the BA uses analysis software to identify patterns of misuse.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.12: According to Terzenbach, the BA is preparing for a possible wave of insolvency in the autumn.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.13: " Will there be significantly more insolvencies than in the previous year?
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.14: The assessments differ, but we are preparing ourselves for the eventuality and are already training our employees in the employment agencies to process applications for insolvency money. "
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.15: The figures are still inconspicuous, said Terzenbach.
pnn.de.185998.1: World Heritage in Potsdam: Party in the New Garden dissolved
pnn.de.185998.2: Potsdam - On Friday evening, around 40 young people celebrated a party in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.3: The collection was dissolved at 8: 48 p.m. by the district drivers of the Prussian Palaces and Gardens Foundation (SPSG), the foundation announced at PNN's request.
pnn.de.185998.4: The young people then left the park.
pnn.de.185998.5: On Saturday evening, some young people played rugby in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.6: The meadow was cleared by district drivers, said SPSG spokesperson Frank Kallensee on Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.7: Again and again there are illegal celebrations in the parks
pnn.de.185998.8: In the Foundation's parks, there are frequent gatherings in which the distance and hygiene rules of the COVID-19 Handling Ordinance are not observed.
pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June there was a celebration with around 300 people in the Babelsberg Park, and a week later around 150 people celebrated in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without a corona ordinance, the parks are closed at nightfall.
pnn.de.185998.11: Storage on the meadows is prohibited according to the park regulations, there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has been complaining for some time that visitors are leaving behind more and more rubbish and destroying protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: Meanwhile, illegal park parties in Berlin have taken on a different dimension.
pnn.de.185998.14: On Sunday night, 5000 people celebrated an illegal techno party in Hasenheide in the district of Neukölln.
pnn.de.185998.15: The event was broken up by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass tests after corona outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: Authorities have responded to a corona outbreak in the popular Upper Austrian tourist resort of St. Wolfgang with hundreds of tests.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, according to the state authorities in Linz.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still to come in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: According to the study, many of those infected are young trainees in tourism businesses, but at least one holiday guest also tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism staff were asked to stay in their accommodation on Saturday evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: " There are cancellations and cancellations of bookings here and there, " the head of the Wolfgangsee Tourism Association, Hans Wieser, told dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.9: A few guests also left early.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the most important tourist resort in Upper Austria, with more than 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season, around one third of the guests are Germans.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: The first infections became public knowledge on Friday.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: On Saturday, the head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended the behaviour of the trainees, who had celebrated in several restaurants and could have been infected there.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: " We all enjoyed doing this in our youth, " he told radio station Ö1.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The tourism association has launched an information campaign to raise awareness among young employees of the dangers of COVID-19.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.17: Starting on Saturday, hundreds of employees, holidaymakers and locals were tested.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.18: In addition, all guests who were in St. Wolfgang from 15 July were contacted.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak evokes memories of the Austrian ski and party resort of Ischgl in Tyrol, which in the early stages of the pandemic was a centre for the spread of COVID-19 throughout Europe.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: In total, more than 1500 people in Austria are currently infected with the virus.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: The focus of new infections is on Vienna and Upper Austria.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualified for the Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (dpa) - The English football record champions Manchester United are returning to the Champions League after a year of absence.
wn.de.700458.3: On the final day of the Premier League, the Red Devils secured third place in the standings with a 2-0 (0-0) victory over their direct rivals Leicester City.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes will now have to settle for the Europa League, as Chelsea FC passed by and also qualified for the premier class in fourth place.
wn.de.700458.5: Aston Villa was able to cheer in the fight against relegation.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead with a penalty kick from Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in injury time, Jesse Lingard (90 + 8) scored the final score.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, FC Bayern's opponent in the Champions League round of 16, won 2: 0 (2: 0) against Wolverhampton Wanderers in parallel thanks to Mason Mount (45th + 1) and Olivier Giroud (45th + 4).
wn.de.700458.9: " That means a lot to me, " said coach Frank Lampard, who in his first season as Chelsea coach is also up against Arsenal in the FA Cup final.
wn.de.700458.10: Chelsea's victory against Wolverhampton also benefited Tottenham Hotspur, who passed the Wolves with a meagre 1: 1 (1: 0) win at Crystal Palace and started sixth in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa won the long-distance duel with Watford FC and AFC Bournemouth, but had to tremble for a long time for a place in the league at West Ham United.
wn.de.700458.12: Andrej Yarmolenko (85) immediately made up for the late lead of Jack Grealish (84).
wn.de.700458.13: However, the 1: 1 (0: 0) score was enough because Watford lost 2: 3 (1: 3) to Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which lost three coaches in the season, is relegated after five years in the premier league.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, which could no longer save itself with a 3: 1 (2: 1) victory at Everton.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, one point was missing.
wn.de.700458.17: Liverpool FC, who have been the English champions since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3: 1 (1: 1) victory at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 points is the highest score the Reds have ever scored in a football season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Jürgen Klopp and his team narrowly missed the points record in English football.
wn.de.700458.20: Manchester City holds the record with 100 points in the 2017 / 18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After the Newcastle lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38th), Divock Origi (59th) and Sadio Mané (89th) turned the game for Liverpool on Sunday.
wn.de.700458.22: " It was an extraordinary season for this wonderful club, " said goalscorer van Dijk after the match, " which should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: The Premier League bosses should also be satisfied in the end.
wn.de.700458.25: Due to the coronavirus crisis, football operations in England were interrupted from 13 March to 17 June.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, it has even been discussed whether the games should be abandoned prematurely or whether the remaining games should be played on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: In the end, however, the season could be played to the end without any special incidents - albeit as in Germany without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence at demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Prime Minister Netanyahu are becoming increasingly fierce.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: Violent clashes broke out during the night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: The Israeli police took violent action in Jerusalem on Sunday night against participants in a demonstration against right-wing conservative Prime Minister Binyamin Netanyahu.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: According to police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld, twelve people have been arrested for participating in riots.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: Among other things, the police used water cannons to disperse the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, a total of around 6,000 people gathered near Netanyahu's official residence on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They protested against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the COVID-19 crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants in a counter-demonstration who supported Netanyahu have also been arrested, reported the news website " ynet. "
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the Prime Minister's private villa in the coastal town of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: According to the police, a man was arrested near Tel Aviv on suspicion of spraying pepper spray from a moving car on demonstrators on the side of the road.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was detained following a stabbing attack on a demonstrator in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The demonstrator's neck was slightly injured.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: There have recently been several demonstrations against Netanyahu in Jerusalem and Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption case against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Recently, Netanyahu has also been criticized for his handling of the COVID-19 crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he is accused of hasty easing and a lack of preparation for a second wave of COVID-19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The COVID-19 crisis has hit the country's economy hard.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate recently stood at more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new infections with the coronavirus in Israel has recently risen to new record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (North Rhine-Westphalia) - Van crashes into car - Nine injured - Ruhrgebiet - Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision on Saturday afternoon on the B58 near Ahlen resulted in nine minor injuries.
bild.254850.3: A female driver was travelling with her two children (3, 5) in the direction of Beckum.
bild.254850.4: The police: " Presumably she had suddenly braked because she wanted to turn. "
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van driving behind her must have seen this too late.
bild.254850.6: He crashed into the back of the car.
bild.254850.7: Three passengers in the car and six in the van were slightly injured in the accident.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took her to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off border town following suspected case of corona
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far seen its own measures to ward off the coronavirus as a " shining success. "
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: The country is now reporting a suspected case for the first time.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Due to a first official case of suspected corona in the country, North Korea has completely cordoned off a major city for fear of a catastrophe.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological defence measures in the past six months, " the malignant virus could have been introduced into the country, " the state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: A state of emergency has been declared for the region around the border town of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The communist leadership declared the highest level of alarm.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If the suspected case is confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: According to its own statements, North Korea has not yet registered a single infection and has described its defence measures as a " shining success. "
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: According to reports, the symptoms of the disease were found in an " outlier " who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on 19 July.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person fled to South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: For the time being, there was no confirmation from South Korea that the border had been crossed within the military buffer zone, which is four kilometres wide and for the most part still mined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: However, according to reports by the national news agency Yonhap, South Korea's military acknowledged the possibility of an illegal border crossing to North Korea as high.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: Investigations have been carried out on a number of individuals.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: According to its own statements, North Korea called an emergency meeting of the Workers' Party Politburo, chaired by leader Kim Jong Un, on Saturday because of the suspicion.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The " dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive catastrophe. "
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: As a preventive measure, Kim had already ordered on Friday that " Kaesong be completely blocked and that every district and region be isolated from others, " the statement went on.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The affected person, as well as all people in Kaesong who have had contact with them, have been put under quarantine.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: Accordingly, the party's central military commission is to investigate the " runaway case " as well as the conduct of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose severe punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: It is estimated that around 300,000 people live in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Tension ahead of Council meeting: City East and noise protection to be discussed before the summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: " In addition to environmental issues, the committee members will also vote on the development plan for the large-scale project Innenstadtentwicklung-Ost, " it says rather casually in the middle section of the city's press release on the next city council meeting on Tuesday, 28 July, at 4.30 p.m. in the Great Hall of the CongressCentrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: However, the upgrading of the eastern part of the city is the subject of heated debate right up to the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities for this are scarce, most recently even negative in individual committees, depending on attendance.
pz-news.de.72354.5: An appeal from industry (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project developed by the citizens and then by the administration and the local council fail after almost ten years of preparation was criticized by project opponent Reinhard Klein as an " extra-parliamentary opposition, " " unaware, " " speculation, " " defamation " and " deliberate false statements. "
pz-news.de.72354.6: " Everyone thinks they know better, " said Klein, who has been a member of the municipal council for a year as the only representative on the citizens' list in Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, after reading the contracts, he was in this position: " I know what I'm talking about. "
pz-news.de.72354.8: The exit would be cheaper for the city, and contrary to statements by the city administration, the Technical Town Hall is looking for subsidies, the existence of which Klein is convinced will cost 8.5 million euros to renovate.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The development of the town will be very different from that predicted by the town hall and by supporters from the business community.
pz-news.de.72354.10: Shaping the city through his own efforts and not an investor: that is his plan B. One day after Klein, the FDP / FW / UB / LED faction, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: Essentially, it also provides for the renovation of the Technical Town Hall, keeping the Schloßberg open, renting the Ex-Thales for administrative areas and a smaller-scale redesign of the city centre, ideally with local sponsors.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: In addition, environmental issues in particular will play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the local council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the population of Pforzheim from health-related noise pollution caused by road traffic, many of which include speed reductions.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local Verkehrsclub Deutschland welcomes the widespread introduction of Tempo 30. However, the political leaders in the city are not innocent of the fact that this must happen, because they have only contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus noise by neglecting regular bus services with thinned-out cycles and little commitment to cycling, according to the VCD.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The town council will also vote on the city's participation in the Pforzheim / Enzkreis Energy and Climate Protection Agency.
pz-news.de.72354.18: The agenda also includes accession to the Climate Protection Pact of the state of Baden-Württemberg, the resetting of parental contributions in municipal day-care centres and the application for admission to federal smart city funding.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must take corona protection measures to heart.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann starts the new season with much delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: With a delay of almost six months, Tim Zimmermann will start his debut season in the ADAC GT Masters on 31 July.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the league of super sports cars can go into regular operation, it was time for the first test runs.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, the main objective was to get to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: For a long time, the corona crisis prevented Tim Zimmermann from embarking on his first business trip in Grasser Racing's new Lamborghini Huracan.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: This was now possible under special hygiene conditions.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old driver from Langenargen completed his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his debut in a GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: " There are already a few things that are different from the Porsche from the previous season, " says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: " With the ABS, for example, you have to go into corners differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really a lot of fun. "
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst, with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: Despite being only 25 years old, the Dutchman is already experienced in GT racing and has been able to help his new team mate in many ways.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: " I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series brings with it new challenges, " says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: " Steijn and I understand each other brilliantly and we have also made enormous progress from session to session at the Lausitzring. "
schwaebische.de.113555.15: It is precisely there - at the Lausitzring - that the GT Masters will hold its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From 31 July, the 33 super sports cars will race through Lusatia.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: However, Zimmermann, who is one of 15 newcomers to the series, knows the track.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: In 2015 he was most recently a guest at the Motodrom.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: " It worked out quickly and I didn't really have to get used to the track, " says Zimmermann, who is competing for the Graf Zeppelin racing team in Friedrichshafen.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: " The Lausitzring has many fast sections that you have to hit optimally to be fast. "
schwaebische.de.113555.21: How fast Zimmermann really is will be revealed in two weeks' time.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: " Of course, the teams play poker a bit during the tests, " he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: " Ultimately, however, we are very satisfied and are looking forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring. "
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the start of a tightly packed calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: Seven races are scheduled until the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current situation is that no spectators will be allowed - but there will be a prominent guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: Ex-Formula One driver Niko Hülkenberg will take the GT steering wheel at the Nürburgring in mid-August.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British Minister of Transport caught off guard by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: According to press reports, the British government's decision to put holidaymakers in Spain under quarantine for two weeks after their return has caught the country's Minister of Transport off guard.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: According to the report, Grant Shapps is currently on holiday in Spain of all places, while his colleagues at home decided on the measure on Saturday.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Due to the rise in corona numbers in Spain, the cabinet in London removed the country from the list of countries from which entry is possible without quarantine requirements.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new regulation will apply from today, Sunday, which means that Shapps will also have to go into quarantine after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures for returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: But for those who are just on holiday on the cut-off date, the regulation only applies from Saturday, 1 August, and was not introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: Incidentally, Spain is currently regarded in Austria as one of the " safe countries " for which no quarantine in Austria is required.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: " Many ministers must have known in advance that there is a possibility that a quarantine will be imposed on holidaymakers in Spain, " commented Labour MP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: " But apparently nobody bothered to let Grant Shapp know. "
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Less than a month after the end of the COVID-19 emergency in Spain and the end of the strict curfew, infections in the country are on the rise again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists believe that nightlife is the main reason for the new spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of Britain's favourite holiday destinations.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government currently advises against unnecessary travel to the Spanish mainland, with the exception of the Canary Islands and the Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular with British holidaymakers.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: To date, more than 272,000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28,000 deaths have been registered in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: On the occasion of Navy Day in his country, Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced that warships will be equipped with state-of-the-art hypersonic weapons.
mz-web.de.376126.3: These weapons, which are unique in the world, would expand the combat capabilities of the Russian naval forces, Putin said at the central naval parade in St. Petersburg on Sunday.
mz-web.de.376126.4: According to the Interfax agency, the Ministry of Defence also provided information on successful tests of the Zirkon hypersonic rocket built for the navy.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a multiple of the speed of sound of around 343 metres per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are considered the weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.7: Underwater tropedeo continues to be built
mz-web.de.376126.8: Construction will also continue on the atomic underwater torpedo Poseidon, it was said.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned sea drone is planned to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The president, who himself also sailed a military boat, said that this year alone 40 new ships would be put into service with the individual fleet units of the largest country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has a larger coastal area than any other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: The navy has been reliably protecting Russia for 300 years, Putin said on the day celebrated by sailors across the country.
mz-web.de.376126.13: The naval forces also celebrated Navy Day with parades in many other Russian coastal towns.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting alongside ruler Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated its strength at an arms show in the Mediterranean port of Tartus.
mz-web.de.376126.16: A video released by the Ministry of Defence showed not only warships, including a submarine, but also combat helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane " Hanna " reaches Texas: Corona makes aid more difficult
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - The first hurricane of this year's season over the Atlantic has hit land in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening floods, strong winds and heavy rainfall are now threatening parts of the US state, the National Hurricane Centre told the US climate agency NOAA on Sunday night (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for many districts.
tt.com.149061.5: The COVID-19 pandemic that is raging in Texas is making the work of aid workers more difficult, Abbott continued, according to the US media.
tt.com.149061.6: Evacuees called upon to exercise caution
tt.com.149061.7: " Every hurricane is a huge challenge, " Abbott said, according to the Houston Chronicle newspaper.
tt.com.149061.8: Referring to the cyclone in Texas, he added, " This challenge is complicated, and is exacerbated when you consider that it is sweeping through an area that is the most affected by COVID-19 in the state. "
tt.com.149061.9: According to the Johns Hopkins University, around 5,000 people have died as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic in Texas alone.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott called on people who had to leave their homes to exercise caution.
tt.com.149061.11: They should not disregard practices " to which we have become accustomed, " such as wearing masks, the governor said, according to CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It is important that everyone keeps their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: For this reason, hotel rooms have been made available in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, corona tests are to be carried out in emergency shelters.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage was initially only reported from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: According to the authorities, with wind speeds of up to 150 kilometres per hour, " Hanna " hit land on the island of Padre Island just off the coast of Texas.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm had previously been upgraded to a hurricane of the lowest level one.
tt.com.149061.19: A storm surge warning was first issued for the stretch of coast from Port Mansfield to Sargent and was later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected a slowdown, while " Hanna " moved further inland and headed for northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, Hurricane " Douglas " was heading towards Hawaii during the night to Sunday with wind speeds of around 150 kilometres per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: However, the hurricane centre expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it will be near Hawaii's largest islands on Sunday (local time) - then as a storm just below the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: According to a forecast made in May, NOAA was expecting an above-average hurricane season over the Atlantic this year.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes are to be expected, of which up to six could be very strong cyclones, the authorities explained.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic, three of which develop into storms of great magnitude.
tt.com.149061.28: In view of available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and the Caribbean, the probability of a normal season is only 30 percent, and that of a below-average season is only ten percent, it was said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: US President Donald Trump wrote on Twitter that his administration is closely monitoring the storms and is in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals denied: Video assistant " punishes " Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic lost two goals
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Naples - Four goals scored, four goals denied: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a pitch-black evening in the 0: 2 (0: 1) at SSC Naples in the Italian football league Serie A - and was really angry with the referee's video assistant.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: " A festival of unfulfilled goals for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: Never before has the VAR acted so harshly against a team, " commented the " Corriere dello Sport. "
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Host Naples took the lead with a goal from full-back Elseid Hisaj in the 8th minute, with Filip Djuricic cheering for the equalizer in the 32nd minute.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) retracted the hit due to an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later, Djuricic shot the ball back into the net - and the VAR intervened again.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: The referee team also withdrew the goals of attacker Francesco Caputo (50th) and Domenico Berardi (61st), following advice from the VAR.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: In injury time, Allan completed the 2-0 final for Naples and the bitter evening for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: " For Sassuolo, the VAR is worse than a speed camera on the road and punishes Sassuolo like no other team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology sets new records, " writes the " Gazzetta dello Sport. "
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - The start of the heated preparation phase for the Champions League began with a setback for double winners FC Bayern.
wn.de.700404.3: Having recovered " reasonably well " after a short holiday and a few training days, Hansi Flick has to think about how he can rebuild his successful defence after the injury of world champion Benjamin Pavard.
wn.de.700404.4: The Frenchman, who has the third most minutes of action behind captain Manuel Neuer and midfielder Joshua Kimmich, suffered a ligament injury to his left foot and threatens to miss out in decisive king-class duels.
wn.de.700404.5: In Munich's dirty weather, the right-back broke off a training match and was driven off the pitch in a golf kart.
wn.de.700404.6: How long the unrestricted regular player will have to take a break in the battle for the title remains to be seen.
wn.de.700404.7: An appearance in the second leg of the round of 16 against FC Chelsea on 8 August is unlikely to be possible, and the 24-year-old can look forward to the final tournament, which begins in Lisbon on 12 August.
wn.de.700404.8: However, Bayern do not want to be stopped by the mishap from training on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.9: In his personal triple formula, Flick named the three attributes he wants to see from his stars on their way to Portugal's capital.
wn.de.700404.10: Quality, intensity and concentration are to be demonstrated by his title collectors, who are hungry for victory, over the ideally following 28 days until the King's Class final on 23 August.
wn.de.700404.11: " We have simply excellently mastered the compulsory tasks with the championship and the trophy.
wn.de.700404.12: Now it's time to create something special, " said Flick.
wn.de.700404.13: Until the Munich team can deal with the final tournament and before that with a training camp in the Algarve, they will first be required to play the round of 16 against Chelsea FC.
wn.de.700404.14: After the 3-0 win in the first leg before the corona break, the Londoners should not once again become a Bayern nightmare in their home arena, as they did in the lost " final at home " in 2012.
wn.de.700404.15: " We first have to go through the door.
wn.de.700404.16: We want to win, create good conditions and build trust with a good game, " demanded Flick.
wn.de.700404.17: A test to get you in the mood is scheduled for Friday against Olympique Marseille.
wn.de.700404.18: With a long speech, Flick had sworn his stars, who had 13 days of holiday after the double, to a unique August.
wn.de.700404.19: He welcomed 31 players to Säbener Straße, including the new players around Edel-Einkauf Leroy Sané, who met all his new colleagues on the pitch for the first time after his move from Manchester City.
wn.de.700404.20: " Like all the newcomers, Leroy has fitted in well, " reported Flick.
wn.de.700404.21: But instead of talking about the new season, when Sané & Co. are no longer just allowed to train, Flick preferred to talk about the current title project of the German series champion.
wn.de.700404.22: After days of individual and small-group training, they are now training in team strength for the Londoners, who, in contrast to the Flick ensemble, are in the rhythm of play.
wn.de.700404.23: After that, Munich could face a quarter-final against FC Barcelona and Lionel Messi, with potential opponents in the semi-final being Real Madrid, Manchester City or Juventus Turin.
wn.de.700404.24: A path to the final in Lisbon " is not that easy, " emphasised the head coach, who will be able to rely on the services of his new assistant Miroslav Klose in training from Tuesday.
wn.de.700404.25: World Cup record scorer Klose and Flick know from many joint tournament preparations what is particularly important in the 0-to-100 set-up.
wn.de.700404.26: Working with his current team is " a pleasure, " praised Flick.
wn.de.700404.27: The " focus on winning " is an impressive characteristic of his team.
wn.de.700404.28: The tournament with nine-man teams was also ambitious on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.29: All of the top performers were there, including Thiago, who wanted to leave, and defender David Alaba, whose whereabouts are not guaranteed beyond the king's class season.
salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to choose its world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to drive on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise to award the World Championship titles.
salzburg.com.306641.3: However, all American races were cancelled.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Race calendar is becoming more and more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The racing calendar for the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten confirmed Grand Prix so far, three further race tracks were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, the race will take place at the Nürburgring in Germany and in Portimão, Portugal.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On the first of November, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will fight for championship points on the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: This means that the 2020 racing calendar currently comprises 13 races.
salzburg.com.306641.10: " We are delighted that we are continuing to make great strides in completing our plans for the 2020 season, " said Formula One boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: A total of 15 to 18 races in the premier class of motorsport are to be completed in this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 wants to close its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar is to be finalised and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: According to media reports, appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia could take place at the end of November before the already officially planned races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: However, the Formula 1 regulations require at least races on three continents for the awarding of the World Championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, there will only be races on two continents, there will be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles with reference to " exceptional circumstances " due to the corona virus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start to the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the looming crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent before the end of this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 will not be a guest in America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Cancellation meets with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense corona situation, the races in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil will not take place.
salzburg.com.306641.24: " We look forward to being with them again next season, " said Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the American races met with criticism, particularly in Brazil: " The cancellation did not come as a surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for this, " said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in São Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: Infections in the São Paulo region, for example, are significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: The concerns of some teams about not wanting to race in Brazil would also not justify a cancellation.
salzburg.com.306641.28: They are prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil eye against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert's well-known late-night show via video and revealed in an interview what she had in mind when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was a guest in a popular US late-night show via video.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she talked about her fight against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also talked about her famous " evil eye " when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - Over the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has drawn attention to herself with her tireless commitment to the " Fridays For Future " movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke in a well-known late-night show about her plans for the future and her meeting with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Late-night presenter Stephen Colbert welcomed 17-year-old Thunberg to your programme on Tuesday and conducted a longer interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She spoke not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the world's powerful.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: " There are some things that surprised me, " she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: " How far people are going to steer the focus away from the climate crisis, " she said, was shocking.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: " Everything from organised hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children are taking to the streets, " she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: Heads of state and leading politicians who scoff at her on social media or even try to silence her find her " funny " because the reactions show her " because they have no other answer. "
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview, when Greta Thunberg was asked about a well-known scene in which she cast a bitterly angry look after US President Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the UN Climate Summit 2019 in New York, for which the activist sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was captured by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip resulted in a GIF, i.e. an animated image, which ultimately became one of the most frequently used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what was the 17-year-old thinking about the US president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: To the relatively open question posed by Stephen Colbert, she answered only briefly and dryly: " To be honest, I think that needs no further explanation. "
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert had probably not reckoned with the quick-witted answer and disappeared from the picture with a brief laugh.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her " How dare you? " speech on the principles of climate protection, she was remembered by many at the climate conference.
morgenpost.de.276366.1: Ex-Dortmunder Immobile mit Dreierpack für Lazio Rom
morgenpost.de.276366.2: Ciro Immobile is now on a par with Bavaria's Robert Lewandowski in the race for Europe's Golden Boot.
morgenpost.de.276366.3: Former Dortmund player Ciro Immobile still has the best chance of becoming the top scorer in the Italian football championship.
morgenpost.de.276366.4: The former BVB pro contributed three goals to the 5: 1 (1: 1) victory of Lazio Rome at Hellas Verona, including two converted penalties in the aftermath of both halves.
morgenpost.de.276366.5: This means that the 30-year-old, who came fourth in the standings two games before the end of the season, now has 34 goals for the season on his account - just as many were scored by Robert Lewandowski of FC Bayern Munich in the last Bundesliga season.
morgenpost.de.276366.6: In Italy, Cristiano Ronaldo has scored 30 goals so far, while the Portuguese superstar faced Sampdoria Genoa with the leader in the evening.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green has died
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a rollercoaster ride: After a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly uphill again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now blues rock guitarist Peter Green has passed away at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Ingenious guitarist, drug junkie, cult fan: The co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members announced in an official statement on Saturday that a further statement would be announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians such as Peter Frampton praised Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: In an emotional reaction, Mick Fleetwood spoke of a " monumental loss " for all former and current members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: Drummer Fleetwood and guitarist Green founded the now legendary band in London in 1967, and his dreamy instrumental hit " Albatross " remains unforgotten to this day.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician's life (" The End Of The Game, " " In The Skies ") resembled a rollercoaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: With Fleetwood Mac, Green experienced a rapid rise - but the band celebrated their greatest successes without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: There is said to have been a dispute, among other things, because Green wanted to donate all of the group's profits to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to perform in wide robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Just three years after their founding, Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.15: This was followed by a social decline.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, as biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: Green was treated in psychiatry for a long time.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: During most of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have lived temporarily on the street, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent some time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a Jewish working-class family in the London district of Bethnal Green.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: Even at a young age he was enthusiastic about US blues musicians such as B.B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: He learned his first guitar chords at the age of eleven.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager began to play the guitar professionally and five years later got the chance to appear on stage as lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: A little later he was engaged by the Bluesbreakers to replace his idol Eric Clapton.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the midst of the blues boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 together with his Bluesbreakers colleagues Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song " Albatross, " composed by Green, brought the group their first number one hit in the winter of 1968 / 69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid ascent soon showed its downsides: Green could not cope with the media hype, his experiments with the drug LSD became more and more extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on life between music and addiction in an interview: " The worst thing that happened to me in my life was drugs - the best thing was to land a number one hit. "
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green achieved a surprising success in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Meanwhile, Fleetwood Mac swam without him in a new formation on a wave of success.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Their 1977 album " Rumours " sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various small solo successes, Green did not make a major comeback until he started again in 1996 with a group of musician friends.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: At the time, the British " Daily Telegraph " spoke of a rock star returning to earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free of drugs, Green released several albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band broke up in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his gentle sound he was one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
